name: HTML
Details: HTML is the language in which most websites are written. HTML is used to create pages and make them functional.

name: CSS
Details: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

name: HTML-5
Details: HTML5 is the latest standard of Hypertext Markup Language, the code that describes the structure and presentation of web pages.

name: Bootstrap
Details: Bootstrap is the most popular CSS Framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites.

name: Javascript
Details: JavaScript often abbreviated to JS, is a programming language.

name: React
Details: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs.
